smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function testRepresentativeCharacter is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onPreferenceTreeClick appears to be too complex.
The function initialiseCustomTabUi appears to be too complex.
The function updateToolbarButtonStates appears to be too complex.
The function sslErrorEvent appears to be too complex.
The function pressTipEvent appears to be too complex.

smells.name: ThrowingExceptionsWithoutMessageOrCause
smells.description: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

instances.message: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

smells.name: NotImplementedDeclaration
smells.description: The NotImplementedDeclaration should only be used when a method stub is necessary. This defers the development of the functionality of this function. Hence, the NotImplementedDeclaration should only serve as a temporary declaration. Before releasing, this type of declaration should be removed.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function getRepresentativeSnippet has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function onBackPressed has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function beautifyUrl has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function createDownloadListener has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function handleUnsupportedLink has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function xmlToString has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function handleIntent has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (firstChar ?: DEFAULT_ICON_CHAR) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: firstChar ?: DEFAULT_ICON_CHAR
Parentheses in (urlLoading != null && urlLoading != url) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: urlLoading != null && urlLoading != url
Parentheses in (urlLoading != null && urlLoading != session.url) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: urlLoading != null && urlLoading != session.url
Parentheses in (dateFormat.format(Date()).toLong()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: dateFormat.format(Date()).toLong()
Parentheses in (HISTOGRAM_SIZE - 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: HISTOGRAM_SIZE - 2
Parentheses in (intent.flags and Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_LAUNCHED_FROM_HISTORY) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: intent.flags and Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_LAUNCHED_FROM_HISTORY

smells.name: UtilityClassWithPublicConstructor
smells.description: The class declaration is unnecessary because it only contains utility functions. An object declaration should be used instead.

instances.message: The class IconGenerator only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
The class Features only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
The class FileUtils only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
The class SearchEngineWriter only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: FunctionOnlyReturningConstant
smells.description: A function that only returns a constant is misleading. Consider declaring a constant instead

instances.message: shouldBlockImages is returning a constant. Prefer declaring a constant instead.
supportsDownloadingFiles is returning a constant. Prefer declaring a constant instead.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `0 to 0`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `activeMatchOrdinal to numberOfMatches`

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class MenuItem defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class Tip defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
